name: Aashutosh Joshi

experience.title: Investment Team
experience.description: Earlsfield Capital is a London based, sector agnostic, Venture Capital firm that invests in technology start-ups during their growth stage. We look to partner with and support entrepreneurs who are solving large problems and building scalable solutions.Investments are focused in India and Southeast Asia. Write to me at aashutosh@earlsfieldcapital.com.
